thread.title: Entelic Recommends Complimentary IT Security & IT Cost Reduction Assessment for Financial Services Industry
thread.title_full: Entelic Recommends Complimentary IT Security & IT Cost Reduction Assessment for Financial Services Industry - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Entelic Recommends Complimentary IT Security & IT Cost Reduction Assessment for Financial Services Industry
text:
MSP offering 1 month of free IT services & support with assessment during September 2015
DALLAS-FORT WORTH, Texas
Entelic, a managed service provider (MSP) specializing in online collaborative business and complete technology solutions, today announced it’s recommending a free IT Security and IT Cost Reduction Assessment to CPAs, investment advisors and other financial services firms now through September 30, 2015. The audit focuses on reducing business risks and costs for firms looking to get ahead in the financial services industry. By ordering the assessment, these firms also have an opportunity to get a complimentary month of managed IT services and cloud solutions with a 12-month agreement.
“We are offering one month of free IT support for new clients in the financial services industry so they can reduce costs and better protect business data, as well as remain compliant,” said Michael Brandt, senior partner and owner, Entelic. “We are looking to help these business owners get unchained from accounting systems and spend more time focusing on running their business.”
To learn more about Entelic’s complimentary IT Security and IT Cost Reduction Assessment and its limited-time offer of one month of free managed IT services, please visit http://www.entelic.com or call 214.356.1927.
About Entelic
Entelic is an Allen, Texas-based managed service provider (MSP) that offers IT support and business solutions to local businesses throughout the greater Dallas-Fort Worth area. Some of the company’s most popular network solutions involve total managed services, hourly IT services, cloud computing, cloud service management, IT strategy, IT consulting, IT management, data backup, data recovery, server and network solutions, cabling, VoIP phone and Virtual CIO. Entelic provides managed IT services for a variety of industries, including non-profit, financial, medical, advertising, media, legal, real estate and construction. For more information about Entelic and its IT solutions, visit the company on the web at entelic.com. To learn more now, call 844.368.3542. Also, to get the latest industry news and trends, go to entelic.com/blog/.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/08/prweb12920174.htm
